remarks: A condition implying that two Hilbert space operators are equal.  Lemma 3.2(S9) of [Beran] p. 95.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hoeq1 $p |- ( ( S : ~H --> ~H /\ T : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( A. x e. ~H A. y e. ~H ( ( S ` x ) .ih y ) = ( ( T ` x ) .ih y ) <-> S = T ) ) $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
